lead_paragraph: Candace Parker scored 16 points to help the undefeated United States rout Cuba, 90-50, in the first game of second-round play at the Women’s World Basketball Championship in São Paulo, Brazil. The United States is 4-0. The top four teams in each of the two second-round groups will advance to the quarterfinals.
